description:
two images on  mount; Top: elderly peasant with cane and tall hat; facing left (reverse of original)

lower image: landscape:  settlement at left on a stream; pathe at right with man carrying two buckets on a yoke; dog running beside man; water at right with sail boats
dimension:
1 15/16 × 2 in. (4.92 × 5.08 cm) (image, sheet, top image)
3 3/8 × 7 1/2 in. (8.57 × 19.05 cm) (image, sheet, lower image)
11 15/16 × 9 11/16 in. (30.32 × 24.61 cm) (mount)
marks:
Signature, Date, and Inscription

image 1: in pl See Inscriptions
title: Print
